name: @yousolution/node-red-contrib-you-tunnel-websocket
description: Module to create websockeet tunnel for NODE-RED

scripts.update: npm pack && mv yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-tunnel-websocket-$npm_package_version.tgz ./data && cd data && rm -rf node_modules && npm i yousolution-node-red-contrib-you-tunnel-websocket-$npm_package_version.tgz && docker-compose restart

author: Andrea Trentin <andrea.trentin@yousolution.cloud>
